snippet: A City Council committee says personal conflicts led to voters’ being turned away when polls did not open on time and resulted in delayed vote totals.
abstract: Hartford, Conn, releases report accusing Hartford Registrar of Voters office of mishandling of ballots and polling stations leading to unclear general election results.
lead_paragraph: A City Council committee says personal conflicts led to voters’ being turned away when polls did not open on time and resulted in delayed vote totals.

headline.main: Squabbles Among Hartford Vote Officials Fueled Election Woes, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Panel Faults City Agency Over Voting in Hartford
